pageContext.claim: “I don't know that she [the late Ruth Bader Ginsburg] said that, or if that was written out by Adam Schiff, and Schumer and Pelosi. That came out of the wind. It sounds so beautiful, but that sounds like a Schumer deal, or maybe Pelosi or Shifty Schiff.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump baselessly suggests Ginsberg's request -- relayed by her granddaughter Clara Spera -- that her replacement be chosen by the next president was actually written by  House Speaker Nancy Pelosi, Rep. Adam Schiff or Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer. There is no evidence to that effect and NPR's Nina Totenberg confirmed that others in the room, including Ginsberg's doctor, heard her statement.
